Articles.Content: I've been playing career mode for some time now and have this whole 'Once ones dead he stays dead' think going on, is it possible to actually keep them dead instead of re spawning or do I just deselect them when they're added as the mission pilots? (Btw this is about Kerbals go figure)

go to saves

go to the folder containing the SFS files (should be any folders in saves)

edit persistent and/or quicksave with notepad or other text editing programs (just force it to)

find line 62 or use CTRL-F to find "MissingCrewsRespawn"

change " = true" to " = false" after "MissingCrewsRespawn"

Simple,

Go into the persistant save file, set respawn to FALSE, and they will stay dead.

Open your persistent.sfs with Notepad, find "MissingCrewsRespawn" (it's in the start - just scroll down a little) and change it from True to False.

EDIT: Damn, ninja'd
Thank you, now I have a reason for an R.I.P Jebediah Flag!
And suddenly my kerbals are afraid. Very afraid. Thanks!
